docs.snippet: Bruce left the game with a cramp in his right calf, a minor injury. The bigger worry for the Mets was a lost opportunity against the St. Louis Cardinals on their most likely path to the playoffs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bruce left the game with a cramp in his right calf, a minor injury. The bigger worry for the Mets was a lost opportunity against the St. Louis Cardinals on their most likely path to the playoffs.
docs.abstract: St Louis Cardinals rout New York Mets, 8-1; other baseball news noted.

headline.main: Jay Bruce Limps Off as Cardinals Clobber the Mets

docs.lead_paragraph: China Inc's record burst of investment in global football could leave investors burnt and out of pocket, says China's richest man, Wang Jianlin, in the highest profile warning yet on a $4 billion (3.03 billion pounds) splurge since 2015 that has stunned European football.

docs.abstract: Hawaii football players are gearing up for start of 2016 season, in which they will travel away from--and back to--Honolulu for at least seven games, logging almost 50,000 miles of air travel.

headline.main: Rio Police: Irishmen Say Their Top Official Handled Tickets

docs.snippet: As the search for survivors ground on, Premier Matteo Renzi pledged new money and measures Thursday to rebuild quake-devastated central Italy amid mounting soul-searching over why the seismic-prone country has continually failed to ensure its buil...
docs.lead_paragraph: As the search for survivors ground on, Premier Matteo Renzi pledged new money and measures Thursday to rebuild quake-devastated central Italy amid mounting soul-searching over why the seismic-prone country has continually failed to ensure its buildings can withstand such catastrophes.

headline.main: Aftershocks Rattle Italian Quake Zone; Toll Rises to 250
headline.print_headline: Aftershocks Rattle Italian Quake Zone; Toll Rises to 250

docs.snippet: Some politicians began backpedaling as an outcry grew on social media over the apparent public humiliation and ostracism of Muslim women dressed in modest attire....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some politicians began backpedaling as an outcry grew on social media over the apparent public humiliation and ostracism of Muslim women dressed in modest attire.
docs.abstract: French police begin enforcing ban on modest beach attire worn by Muslim women on beaches in at least 20 municipalities, prompting backlash against bans; French organizations and politicians that have refrained from commenting on bans have begun to voice opposition as vaguely worded bans have affected not only those wearing so-called burkinis but also other Muslim women wearing modest clothing.

headline.main: French ‘Burkini’ Bans Provoke Backlash as Armed Police Confront Beachgoers
headline.print_headline: Backlash Wells Up as the French Police Enforce ‘Burkini’ Bans
